005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>
028 * function.
029 */
030public final class ArrayGet {
031  private static final String NAME = "get";
032  @NonNull
033  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
034      .name(NAME)
035      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
036      .deterministic()
037      .contextIndependent()
038      .focusIndependent()
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("array")
041          .type(IArrayItem.type())
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .argument(IArgument.builder()
045          .name("position")
046          .type(IIntegerItem.type())
047          .one()
048          .build())
049      .returnType(IItem.type())
050      .returnZeroOrOne()
051      .functionHandler(ArrayGet::execute)
052      .build();
053
054  private ArrayGet() {
055    // disable construction
056  }
057
058  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
059  @NonNull
060  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
061      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
062      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
063      IItem focus) {
064    IArrayItem<?> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
065    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
066
067    return get(array, position).toSequence();
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
072   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>.
073   *
074   * @param <T>
075   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
076   * @param target
077   *          the array of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
078   * @param positionItem
079   *          the integer position of the item to retrieve
080   * @return the retrieved item
081   * @throws ArrayException
082   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
083   */
084  @NonNull
085  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T get(
086      @NonNull List<T> target,
087      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem) {
088    return get(target, positionItem.asInteger().intValue());
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
093   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>.
094   *
095   * @param <T>
096   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
097   * @param target
098   *          the array of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
099   * @param position
100   *          the integer position of the item to retrieve
101   * @return the retrieved item
102   * @throws ArrayException
103   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
104   */
105  @NonNull
106  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T get(
107      @NonNull List<T> target,
108      int position) {
109    try {
110      return ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(target.get(position - 1));
111    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
112      throw new ArrayException(
113          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
114          String.format("The index %d is outside the range of values for the array size '%d'.",
115              position,
116              target.size()),
117          ex);
118    }
119  }
120}
